parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Pattern of 32 standard case alpha-numeric characters

parameters.name: store_name
parameters.description: The store name is required in the request

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The item id of the item

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Status message about the error state if an error happened

response_fields.name: result_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for API request error tracking

error_codes.description: The {item_name} or {item_pd} is not exist in the shopping bag but exist in the request; please use delete API

notes: This appears to be an API for updating items in a Q2 Dashboard system. The documentation includes multiple endpoint URLs for different regions and comprehensive error handling. The API requires authentication via session_id and includes store-specific operations.
